ej,saboc001,P,monte901,Using corked bat $Chris Sabo cracked his bat on a foul ball and took another bat from the bat boy; he fouled the next pitch and then hit a popup, on which his bat broke, with a large part of the barrel flying towards 3B; HP umpire Tom Hallion retrieved the bat, saw the cork and showed it to crew chief Ed Montague; Sabo was ejected by Montague
ej,knigr001,M,poncl901,Call at 1B Reds manager Ray Knight ejected by 1B umpire Larry Poncino sometime in seventh inning
$Brian Hunter called for interference
ej,mitck001,P,poncl901,Called third strike Kevin Mitchell ejected by HP umpire Larry Poncino
Debut game for Carl Schutz
